description: <h1>And he worked on dark crystal so he knows what he's talking about.</h1>
Keeping the &2Crimson Forest&r dangerous, &cHoglins&r move quickly and have high knockback.
They're too wide to enter a &dthree-block hole&r, but their fast movement can make it hard to dig one once angered.
Hoglins drop &3Porkchops&r and &3Leather&r - the only hostile mob to do so.

title.text: And he worked on dark crystal so he knows what he's talking about.
